text: Courchevel is a commune in the department of Savoie, southeastern France. This city was established on by merging the two formerly distinct communes of Saint-Bon-Tarentaise (the seat) and La Perrière.Arrêté préfectoral 8 August 2016 It takes its name from the eponymous nearby ski resort of Courchevel. == See also == *Communes of the Savoie department == References == Category:Communes of Savoie
title: Courchevel (commune)
